casebody.data:
Faye S. GRAY a/k/a Faye Stanley Gray and James Gray, Jr., Appellants,
v.
YOUDALI INTERNATIONAL INVESTMENTS, LLC, a Florida Limited Liability Company; Ford Motor Credit Company, LLC, a Delaware Limited Liability Company f/k/a Ford Motor Credit Company, a Corporation; United States of America, Department of the Treasury, Internal Revenue Service; Copper Ridge Point Homeowners Association, Inc., a Florida Not-for-Profit Corporation; James Gray, III; and Jason Gray, Appellees. Case No. 2D18-1513 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed January 30, 2019

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
